root.name: Ghost Pirates of Vooju Island
root.description: OverviewThe original pending title for this game was Teal Harvest: Terror Beyond the Act or Power of Forming a Mental Image of Something Not Present to the Senses or Never Before Wholly Perceived in Reality. Thankfully, at least one of the developers was a sensible person, and had it changed to something far less ridiculous.
